page.title: 04Employment in Auchtermuchty
page.content: The small attractive country town of {Auchtermuchty}with a population of around{1500}is unique in that it has quite a number of{factories}giving employment to{local people.}These include the following- { Russell ph - Laboratory glassware { John White - Scale makers { Ferlie's Foundry - Iron castings { Jayfor's - Knitwear and hosiery { U.A.M. - Agricultural products { Rippin's - Steel scaffolding. Employment is also provided by{local {shops, hotels, farms and the Forestry {Commission.}Other people choose to live in the attractive village of Auchtermuchty because they can easily commute to such places as{Cupar, {Ladybank, Newburgh, Glenrothes, Leven, {Perth, Dundee, Edinburgh and Glasgow. But with{no railway station}and a{poor {bus service}most families have a car.
